review_title: Needs a fair bit of work
one_reviews_text: This game is a bit like Herobound except that it doesn't seem to have any puzzles, the animations could use a lot of work and hit detection needs to be tightened up. I'm pretty sure that it uses random generation for the rooms because it starts differently every time and not from where I left off. I quit after encountering the exact same room four times in a row. With a good amount of polish it could be a fun distraction, but right now it's just not there.
